title: Free nitrate testing to be offered for owners of private wells at Magic Valley Health ...
text: ( Source : Idaho Department of Environmental Quality ) Friday, October 09 , 2015 TWIN FALLS - Owners of private wells can have their drinking water tested for nitrate at the Magic Valley Health Fair , Saturday, October 17 . Idaho Department of
